trans-unit.target: You cannot work on this volume as you don't have it in your library.
The manga must have a name.

{0} You did not give the manga a name. The name must have at least {{ limit }} characters.|{1} The name of the manga must have at least {{ limit }} characters.|[2, Inf] The name of the manga must have at least {{ limit }} characters.
An error occured during the upload process.
The image you submit is bigger then what you are authorized to.
The file you submit is no image.
The manga has to have someone who wrote it.
The manga has to have at least one person who illustrated it.
The manga has to have a volume number.
Mangas start at volume 1. The volume you submit must be {{ limit }} or more.
The volume must be a number.
The volume must be part of a serie.
The language of the manga is no known language (is it written in alien?).
